channel.title: Big problems (plz try to help)

item.title: Big problems (plz try to help)
item.dc:creator: @erwinho14 erwinho14
item.description:
@erwinho14 wrote:

hi ppl i got big problem last week i was updating alot on my new v2 source of pktown today 11th of january i got illegal start of expression after illlegal start of expresion im sick of it i deleted ::xslime because it had problem but now this code had problem

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount > 0) { if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0) { if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot] + 1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot] - 1), amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064);
and i cant remove it the problem is (says the comiler) the P of public void has a illegal start of expresion now i really want help because al updates i did didnt work out because of this shit problem how can i move on and go on with updating plz help

erwin, pktown[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2009, 08:43:29 am[/size][hr]why nobody helps?? whats this?

Read full topic
